Portfolio Design | Redesign Personal Portfolio Website

PROJECT DESCRIPTION
Earlier this year, I decided to rebrand myself and completely redesign my professional portfolio website. For the first time, I have designed a static site from scratch and did not use a content management system like WordPress. I started with a blank screen with a blinking cursor and wrote all the html, CSS, and JavaScript.
